---
layout: post
title: "A neverending story"
categories: article
date: 2019-02-27 16:24:00 +0200
---

Back then;
I did it;
I liked it much;
Found it a necessary touch;

Never it challenged, I;
then saw;
A source without it;
didn't look too raw;

Since then
it flows without it well
Some purists call it living hell.
